name: Mr Wiz's Clean Up
description:
Help Mr Wiz clean up his workshop by getting all these pesky bits and pieces into the cauldron!

Controls:

Click and drag - object levitation

WASD/Arrow keys - left right movement and jump

I apologise for the poor quality in this game, I had a lot of unexpected development issues which set me back a bit. Never the less, enjoy and please if you have any - feedback is greatly appreciated! Thanks!

NOTES (not excuses, please use them as feedback - I need to manage my time better):

. you can score once the game has ended

. weird effect when you walk into colliders (I believe due to the player's collider shape)

. I only had about 2 hours for graphics :(
